title: BFUHS Notification 2025 - Apply Online for 154 Medical Laboratory Technician Posts
description: The Baba Farid University of Health Sciences (BFUHS) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 154 Dialysis Technicians, Lab Technician Jobs. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 10th pass, Diploma, Any Degree, B.Sc., and DMLT can apply for the BFUHS Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode.
